game.name: Fight Life Legacy
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠, 전략
game.shortDescription: Rise through the MMA ranks in this turn-based fighting RPG. Train key stats, manage your career, and face ruthless rivals as you uncover the dark truth behind your father’s mysterious disappearance and fight to build your own legacy as a champion.
